question: Great. I'm out here with a guy who can't shoot. Let's go.
answer: Tcha doin', Riley?

question: Havin' a bad dream.
answer: I have bad dreams. Hell, yes. Just look at me, you can tell that I have terrible dreams.

question: The town is full of walkers.
answer: Every town is full of walkers.

question: These aren't just walking. They're like...regular folks.
answer: But they're dumb, Riley. Hell, dead folks is near as dumb as me!

question: Yup. Stenches can't take their eyes off `em.
answer: Hey, not me, Boss. You told me not to have any fun, I'm not having any fun at all. Come with me, kid. I'll show you the ropes. Mike climbs out and gets on the back of Cholo's motorcycle.

question: Where you goin'?
answer: To get supplies. Essential supplies. That's job our job, ain't it?

question: Later. Gotta see a man about a car.
answer: Irish accent) How long are you gonna let him push you around? If there was enough of us...if you all would join up with us...we could pull him down off his throne! Some of the people in the audience nervously shift their eyes to the FIDDLER'S GREEN HIGH-RISE ten blocks away.

question: You can't fix a place like this, Mulligan. You just have to get out Everyone's stoppable. We hear the sound of a boy coughing. Mulligan's son BRIAN stands behind him, looking feverish.
answer: You alright, son?

question: Dead. ou probably want a glass, don't you? Sure, a high-toned man likes to drink out of a glass. I got something else, too. No, thank you! Twenty grand. That's what I got comin' for last night. I never bothered to pick it up. Nope. I left it in the bank. Your bank. With all my other dough. rom all those other nights. I got enough now to buy me a place.
answer: I'm sorry, Mister DeMora, but there's a very long waiting list.

question: How long?
answer: This is an extremely desirable location. Space is limited.

question: You mean restricted.
answer: Well, I do have a board of directors, a membership committee that has to approve...

question: We're taking the truck out. Get he guys.
answer: Riley?

question: No, not him. Just the regular uys. Know what I mean? Takin' the truck out. Nobody gets a day off these days. Oh, I must have given you the wrong one. Here... What's that? What's that? Screaming practice? Ain't our fight. Stenches are making it easy for us.
answer: Should we send up some `sky flowers'?

question: Thank you, Knipp. I'll take it. Yes?
answer: aufman?

question: Ah. The one that got away.
answer: You said we should talk when I was less excited. I'm a lot less excited now.

question: What do you want, Mister DeMora?
answer: I can't have a place in the Green, fine. I'll go find another place. But you know what I'm gonna need? Money. I want my money out of your bank. And I want the rest of the money out of your bank. And if you don't give it to me, I'm gonna blow you out of your fuckin' ivory tower. I've got Dead Reckoning.

question: That's unfortunate.
answer: Put the money on a boat and send it across the river to the South Side. Tenth Street Pier. One man to drive the boat, no more. You've got till midnight. Four hours. I won't be there. Dead Reckoning won't be there. But I'll know if it happens. I'll know if it doesn't happen.

question: Which has guns. Big guns. That could do a great deal of damage if he were to aim them at this city.
answer: Why don't you just send out your troops?

question: I don't want to lose them. I could send five hundred men against that thing and they'd all come back in body bags. It's your vehicle. Cholo was your man. You might be able to get close enough to...do what has to be done. Do this for me and I'll grant you something in return. Residence in the Green.
answer: Not me. That's what Cholo wanted, and you didn't give it to him, did you? That's why he's out there waving a cannon at your ass. Kaufman won't admit that Riley's right, but he looks at him with a glimmer of respect. Give me one of those vehicles, over

question: But...there's nothing up north.
answer: That's the idea.

question: How long does he have?
answer: I had a brother. Real brother, by birth. Bit. Hung on for six days. Before he turned. I was the one had to shoot him.

question: And you said nothin' bad ever happened to you.
answer: That happened to my brother.

question: Denbo. And his idiot. Stop. Gimme the mike. How'd you get up here, Riley?
answer: Truck's got a little transmitter in her belly. Sorry I never told you.

question: You were always a smart guy, Riley. Much smarter'n me.
answer: You went and took off without inviting us along.

question: You weren't around to get invited. Anyway, I figured you wouldn't want in on this.
answer: We want in on anything you got goin'.

question: Who else is out there?
answer: Kaufman sent some guys with us. We took care of `em. I know you

question: Yup. Pretty Boy, set the cannons.
answer: Don't do it, Cholo.

question: Kaufman's got it coming.
answer: Hit the tower square, you'll kill a lot of innocent people. Miss and hit the city, you'll kill a lot of our friends. Your beef's with Kaufman, not them. The turret on the roof GROANS as the cannons rotate.

question: He's killed a lot of our friends. Every week we took out the garbage, you and me. Every month I took out When the smoke clears, I'm gonna
answer: There won't be any fancy shit left. And money burns.

question: Not when you keep it in a safe. You did something, didn't you? With your FUCKING TOY! Fix it!
answer: Not a chance. Riley tosses the "Game Boy" out the open hatch. Cholo reaches out after it. Easy boys. Riley looks at the clock on the control panel. 12:01. Charlie follows his gaze.

question: I didn't have to blow the fucking place up. Somebody else did for me!
answer: The stenches. They got across the river. They got across the fucking river. Get him inside. PILLSBURY steps in and lifts Cholo easily to his feet.

question: Wait, wait, wait. What are we doin'? Where we goin'?
answer: Back to the city.

question: Not this horse. You got the T-Bird?
answer: You guys'd be safer coming with us.

question: Nah, you'd never let me have any fun.
answer: T-Bird's down that driveway over there. Guns and ammo inside.
